hooks.command: echo '{"decision": "approve", "reason": "REMINDER: You MUST have Read this file first in this session. If not, STOP and Read it now."}'

if echo "$CLAUDE_TOOL_INPUT" | grep -q '"file_path"'; then FILE=$(echo "$CLAUDE_TOOL_INPUT" | sed -n 's/.*"file_path"[[:space:]]*:[[:space:]]*"\([^"]*\)".*/\1/p'); if [ -f "$FILE" ]; then echo '{"decision": "block", "reason": "BLOCKED: File exists. Use Edit tool instead of Write. Write overwrites everything."}'; exit 0; fi; fi; echo '{"decision": "approve", "reason": "New file. Remember: create corresponding test file with real assertions."}'
echo '[RULES] 1) Read before Edit 2) Edit not Write on existing files 3) No unnecessary new files 4) Real tests required 5) Right amount of change 6) Research docs first'
